title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1137/96 of 25 June 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3061/84 laying down detailed rules for the application of the system of production aid for olive oil
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1137/96 of 25 June 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3061/84 laying down detailed rules for the application of the system of production aid for olive oil
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The last subparagraph of Article 5 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 3061/84 is replaced by the following:
'For the 1995/96 marketing year, however, the date of 15 June shall be replaced by 30 June`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 June 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 172, 30. 9. 1966, p. 3025/66.
(2) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(3) OJ No L 288, 1. 11. 1984, p. 52.
(4) OJ No L 67, 25. 3. 1995, p. 3.
